医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
激光纹理支架为血管疾病提供了有前景的解决方案由韩国科学技术院（KIST，院长 Oh Sang-Rok）生物材料研究中心的 Hojeong Jeon 博士和 Hyung-Seop Han 博士领导的研究小组，以及来自 KIST 欧洲的 Indong Jun 博士，开发了一种利用激光图案化的新型支架表面处理技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/Laser-textured-stents-offer-promising-solution-for-angio-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/Laser-textured-stents-offer-promising-solution-for-angio-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ce7d709-e17c-4439-93a6-b52de8053470 Thu, 26 Dec 2024 08:00:00 -0500 Laser-textured stents offer promising solution for vascular diseases
新方法允许对鱼牙齿进行无损研究我们能否在不伤害活鱼和其他脊椎动物的情况下，反复详细检查它们的牙齿？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/New-method-allows-non-pressive-study-of-fish-teeth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/New-method-allows-non-pressive-study-of-fish-teeth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08c50d4f-5f34-40a2-826e-a2952653af69 Thu, 26 Dec 2024 07:48:55 -0500 New method allows non-destructive study of fish teeth
免疫细胞中核酸传感器和酶之间复杂的相互作用得到解释根据最近的一项研究，腺苷脱氨酶 2 (ADA2) 已被确定为 Toll 样受体 9 (TLR9​​) 响应核酸激活的调节因子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/Complex-interactions- Between-nucleic-acid-sensors-and-enzymes-in-immune-cells-explained.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241226/Complex-interactions- Between-nucleic-acid-sensors-and-enzymes-in-immune-cells-explained.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df5a22cf-7211-4a92-81eb-0d9bdd15161a Thu, 26 Dec 2024 07:36:26 -0500 Complex interactions between nucleic acid sensors and enzymes in immune cells explained
果蝇窃取细菌防御以生存寄生黄蜂在寄生虫与其宿主之间持续不断的军备竞赛中，创新被认为是成功攻击或防御以提高竞争的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/Fruit-flies-steal-bacterial-defense-to-survive-parasitic-wasps.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/Fruit-flies-steal-bacterial-defense-to-survive-parasitic-wasps.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbb18130-ee8d-4d94-83f1-0d2bb6ba7b1b Tue, 24 Dec 2024 21:52:01 -0500 Fruit flies steal bacterial defense to survive parasitic wasps
欧洲内分泌学会宣布 2025 年首个世界激素日经过三年成功地通过欧洲激素日提高人们对良好激素健康重要性的认识，欧洲内分泌学会 (ESE) 和欧洲激素和代谢基金会 (ESE 基金会) 宣布将有史以来第一个世界激素日定为世界激素日。地点：2025 年 4 月 24 日。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/European-Society-of-Endocrinology-announces-first-ever-World-Hormone-Day-in-2025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/European-Society-of-Endocrinology-announces-first-ever-World-Hormone-Day-in-2025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d319dfc-1c81-4436-901b-db1a29fb046c Tue, 24 Dec 2024 21:46:35 -0500 European Society of Endocrinology announces first-ever World Hormone Day in 2025

“金发姑娘”区：细胞适应性和弹性的关键斯克里普斯研究所的科学家们揭示了一种被称为多磷酸盐 (polyP) 的原始磷酸盐无机聚合物与生命的两个基本组成部分：DNA 和镁元素之间的秘密相互作用，这一发现可能重新定义我们如何理解细胞的弹性和适应性。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/The-Goldilocks-zone-A-key-to-cellular-adaptability-and-resilience.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241224/The-Goldilocks-zone-A-key-to-cellular-adaptability-and-resilience.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df922b9e-9bc6-46ca-a634-fe86ddc65b4e Tue, 24 Dec 2024 12:15:02 -0500 The "Goldilocks" zone: A key to cellular adaptability and resilience
